channel.title: Cmn plz doesnt anyone know how to do this? :(
channel.description:
first of all i got zenithscape source and client :p
hy guys, does anyone know how to add requirements to the object mysterious cape in the Varrock museum like real runescape
So if you click on the mysterious cape that the requirements in your chat bar gets and if you have done all these requirements, for example: all skills 99 and 120 dungeon ring All quest completed unlock all tracks msic ...
that you can get the completionist cape for 5m gp
and then if you completionist cape and if you then for the second time that you click the requireùents chalk for completionist cape (t)
btw srry for my bad english :l

item.title: Cmn plz doesnt anyone know how to do this? :(
item.dc:creator: @chasemortier chasemortier
item.description:
@chasemortier wrote:

case objectid: 2563
if(c.playerLevel[0] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[1] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[2] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[3] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[4] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[5] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[6] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[7] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[8] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[9] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[10] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[11] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[12] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[13] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[14] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[15] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[16] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[17] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[18] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[19] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[20] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[21] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[22] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[23] >= 98) { c.getItems().addItem(itemid, 20769); } else { c.getPA().movePlayer(3212, 3428, 0);//moves to varrock square change coords to whatever c.sendMessage(“Come back when you have achieved maxed stats!”); } break;

i got that already but where i need to put this in to?

item.title: Cmn plz doesnt anyone know how to do this? :(
item.dc:creator: @chasemortier chasemortier
item.description:
@chasemortier wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:5, topic:459175”]Add a method to the object clicking packet[/quote]im just a beginner but do you mean something like this
case objectid: if(c.playerLevel[0] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[1] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[2] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[3] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[4] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[5] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[6] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[7] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[8] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[9] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[10] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[11] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[12] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[13] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[14] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[15] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[16] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[17] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[18] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[19] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[20] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[21] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[22] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[23] >= 98) { c.getItems().addItem(itemid, 1); } else { c.getPA().movePlayer(3212, 3428, 0);//moves to varrock square change coords to whatever c.sendMessage(“Come back when you have achieved maxed stats!”); } break;

?
